alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 8:14PM MDT until August 02 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL EL PASO COUNTY... At 813 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Schriever Space Force Base, or 12 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Wind gust of 62 mph was measured at the Colorado Springs Airport at 807 PM. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Air Force Academy, Manitou Springs, Hanover, Ellicott, Security, Security-Widefield, Falcon, Stratmoor, Fort Carson, Schriever Space Force Base, Cimarron Hills and Peterson Space Force Base. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
